Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 2 Cūḷantaraduka » 2.3 Sanidassanaduka » 2.3.1 Paṭiccavāra » 2.3.1.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Nahetuduka
Cūḷantaraduka
Sanidassanaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Nahetuduka
25.
595Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye ekaṃ, purejāte ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme tīṇi…pe…  jhāne tīṇi, magge ekaṃ, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate tīṇi.
596Paccanīyānulomaṃ.
